section.title: RP 26 Part 1
section.paragraph: This problem will help you master the syntax and semantics of SLang 2. To earn credit for it, you must complete this randomized problem correctly three times in a row.

section.title: RP 27 Part 1
section.paragraph: This problem focuses on the data structures used to implement the environment in the SLang 2 interpreter, as well as some of the data structures used to implement the AST. To earn credit for it, you must complete this randomized problem correctly three times in a row.
